message: Good morning everyone!
Hey Alice! How are you doing?
I'm great! Just finished that project we discussed.
Morning team! What project are we talking about?
The ChatConvert Toolkit - it's a tool for converting CSV chat logs to different formats.
That sounds really useful! What formats does it support?
HTML, Markdown, SQLite, and PDF. Pretty comprehensive!
Wow! Can we see a demo?
Of course! I'll share the repository link.
Is it open source?
Yes! It's MIT licensed. Anyone can use it.
That's awesome! I have some old chat logs I'd love to convert.
Me too! Especially to PDF for archiving.
The PDF output looks really professional with the formatting.
How do we get started with it?
Just clone the repo, run the menu script, and follow the prompts!
Is there a requirements.txt for dependencies?
Yes! Just reportlab for PDF support. Everything else is built-in.
Perfect! I'll try it out this afternoon.
Can it handle large CSV files?
It should work fine with most files. The SQLite option is great for large datasets.
Makes sense. You can query the data then.
Exactly! Much better than scrolling through thousands of messages.
The HTML output is my favorite though - it looks beautiful!
I'm excited to see it. Thanks for building this Alice!
Yeah seriously! This will save so much time.
Happy to help! Let me know if you run into any issues.
Will do! Have a great day everyone!
You too! Talk later!
See you both! Happy converting! ðŸ˜Š
